welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Saginaw, known for its beautiful riverfront, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at MBS International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at MBS International Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
